abbreviateSkills.hint: If enabled, skills and abilities will use a three-character abbreviation.
abbreviateSkills.name: Abbreviate Skill and Ability Names

displayPowerInfo.hint: If enabled, power component information, concentration, and ritual status will be noted next to the power name.
displayPowerInfo.name: Display power information

showItemsWithoutActivationCosts.hint: If enabled, Items that have no activation information will be added to the Inventory list
showItemsWithoutActivationCosts.name: Show Items without Activation costs

showSlowActions.hint: Mostra le azioni che richiedono più di un round
showSlowActions.name: Mostra azioni lente

showUnchargedItems.hint: If enabled, items are shown in the HUD even if they have no remaining charges.
showUnchargedItems.name: Show empty items (includes items and powers)

showUnequippedItems.hint: If enabled, all items are shown for NPCs, not just equipped items.
showUnequippedItems.name: Show all NPC items

showUnpreparedPowers.hint: If disabled, powers such as cantrips, innate, pact, and at-will powers need to be 'prepared' via the power details to be shown on the HUD.
showUnpreparedPowers.name: Show all non-preparable powers
